name: JumpSquare (Deiv_FantasiaNotFound)
description:
In JumpSquare you have to jump step by step higher and higher trying to reach the final goal: a wonderful Cake.

There are some skins that you can unlock playing the game, try to unlock them all :)

This is a Rage Game so be patient and Git Gud <3

This is the official PC Port of the same game in the play store with a different input systems and some improvements of QOL e Level Design.
